categories: Category:Members of the Sphere of Ancient Knowledge
Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Quilon was a Human male Sith apprentice of the Sith Empire. During the Cold War with the Galactic Republic, he served his master, Darth Skotia, inside his bunker on the planet of Dromund Kaas. He was killed when Lord Zash's apprentice infiltrated the base and defeated him.
